author: jdotpz
content:
#Documenting DevOps in a public wiki
I've just started a Mozilla Foundation [DevOps Wiki](https://wiki.mozilla.org/Devops#The_Mozilla_Foundation_DevOps_Wiki), which will be a resource for new staff, contributors, and collaborators as well as outside-of-Mozilla communities.  

Naming standards, code, favorite tools/sites/apps, forms, dashboards full of other dashboards, and animated gifs in Wiki form!
